prompts: Create a mechanical Pokemon with a sleek design and metallic features.
I want a Pokemon that resembles a pair of gears, with a shiny finish.
Generate a dual-type Pokemon that embodies a steampunk aesthetic.
Make a Pokemon that combines technology and nature, featuring a unique color palette.
Imagine a Pokemon that can control metal, with intricate details on its body.
Design a Pokemon with a simple yet effective gear-like structure and vibrant accents.
Give me a Pokemon that represents teamwork, symbolized by its interconnected parts.
